H0.text: Which movie was a biopic about the life of David Helfgott. Amadeus

H1.text: Which movie was a biopic about the life of David Helfgott. A Beautiful Mind

H2.text: Which movie was a biopic about the life of David Helfgott. The Pianist

H3.text: Which movie was a biopic about the life of David Helfgott. Shine

A4.text: Shine is a 1996 Australian biographical psychological drama film directed by Scott Hicks from a screenplay by Jan Sardi, based on the life of David Helfgott, a pianist who suffered a mental breakdown and spent years in institutions.

A5.text: Scott Hicks decided to make a film about David Helfgott after seeing him perform in Adelaide in 1985.
